column4: newbie needs help: My sound was working fine for quite some time. All of a sudden I can only hear the faintest noise when my speakers are at max volume. I've checked my volume levels and everything looks fine. I've rebooted and the problem did not resolve.
I had that problem, my cable was screwed, just a though :)
thank you, but I've unplugged the speakers and the internal speakers aren't outputting either
